unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Bumrah's injury? Heard it was bad. Hope Dr. Sharma's treatment works wonders! Also, what about Dhawan? Last I checked, he was out for a few weeks. Wishing them a speedy recovery! India needs them for the upcoming series. The BCCI must be worried, right? Also, did Jadeja buy that new 2,000 sq ft apartment in Mumbai? Rs. 5 Cr, I heard! Amazing!
